subject: Re: [junit] TestSetup problems
msgSnippet: Hi, I tried to execute your code, and I didn t have any problems, both string got printed: XYZ oneTimeSetup XYZ oneTimeTearDown Regards, Mariano ... [Non-text
messageBody:
Hi,

I tried to execute your code, and I didn't have any problems, both string
got printed:
XYZ oneTimeSetup
XYZ oneTimeTearDown

Regards,
Mariano

On 8/22/05, procrast72 <procrast72@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> i have a problem with the following code:
>
> public class MyTest extends TestCase{
> public MyTest ( String method) {
> super(method);
> }
> public void testA() {
> // do something here
> }
> public static Test suite() {
> TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
> suite.addTest( new MyTest ("testA"));
> TestSetup wrapper = new TestSetup( suite ) {
> protected void setUp() {
> System.out.println("XYZ oneTimeSetup");
> }
> protected void tearDown() {
> System.out.println("XYZ oneTimeTearDown");
> }
> };
>
> return wrapper;
> }
>
> The test runs without any problems, but the string never printed. Does
> anyone know why?
>
> Thanks Mirko
>
>
>
>
>
